```{r}
# Libs
library(readr)
library(tidymodels)
library(broom)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
# Pulling file into environment

Routes <- read_csv("FOCO Spin Data/fortcollins-routes-data-for-scooter-in-all-time.csv")
Streets <- read_csv("FoCo St:Juris/FoCoStreets.csv")
Juris <- read_csv("FoCo St:Juris/Jurisdiction.csv")


# Viewing Data
head(Routes)
summary(Routes)

Routes |>
  group_by(`Segment Name`) |>
  summarize(Count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(Count))
```

```{r}
# Making CSV that Pairs Streets and Jurisdiction

Streets |> 
  filter(str_city == 'FORT COLLINS') -> CSU_STs

CSU_STs
```
